description: FreeBSD 14.2 Beta 1 is out today as the first tagged test snapshot in working toward this newest FreeBSD 14 point release...
title: FreeBSD 14.2 Beta 1 Released To Work Toward This Next Release

description: Cloudflare's Pingora Rust framework that was written as a replacement to Nginx and made publicly open-source earlier this year with a focus on building fast and reliable networked systems is out with its newest feature release...
title: Cloudflare's Pingora 0.4 Rust Framework Released With Experimental Windows Support

description: Sculpt OS for what has been working to become a general purpose operating system built off the original Genode is out with a new feature release...
title: Genode-Based Sculpt OS 24.10 Introduces Multi-Monitor Support

description: Intel has integrated VVC VA-API hardware accelerated decoding support into the widely-used FFmpeg multimedia library...
title: Intel Lands VVC VA-API Hardware Decoding Into FFmpeg

description: KDE developer Nate Graham is out with his weekly development summary of interesting KDE changes in closing out October...
title: KDE Will Nicely Notify You When Apps Are Being Killed Due To Out-Of-Memory

description: Vulkan 1.3.301 was published on Friday with the lone new extension this release being a rare contribution from Huawei adding HDR Vivid support with VK_HUAWEI_hdr_vivid...
title: Vulkan 1.3.301 Released With New Extension For HDR Vivid

description: Right on schedule for releasing the Xfce 4.20 desktop in December, the "Pre1" pre-release was posted on Friday for testing...
title: Xfce 4.20 Pre1 Pre-Release Published For Testing
